code: import React from'react';import Modal from'react-modal';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faGithub,faLinkedin,faGoogle}from'@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons';import'../styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AboutMeModal=_ref=>{let{isOpen,handleClose}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{isOpen:isOpen,onRequestClose:handleClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button",onClick:handleClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\xD7"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-text-title",children:"Hi, my name is Tammy, and welcome to my portfolio!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/assets/aboutme.png",alt:"About Me",className:"about-me-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"I\u2019m a full-stack developer and designer from San Diego, California, passionate about learning, exploring new ideas, and solving problems!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Growing up, I've always enjoyed expressing my creativity through drawing, painting, and crafting with ceramics, paper mache, and wood. I\u2019m a firm believer in consistency and enjoying the journey."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Outside of work, my hobbies include being disappointed by the Celtics failing to win a championship year after year, hoping the Padres and Chargers win their first championship, and rooting for my hometown college basketball team since our city doesn\u2019t have an NBA team to root for.
